snippet: Newt Gingrich’s wooing of The New Hampshire Union Leader secured one of the most coveted endorsements of the presidential election.
abstract: Newt Gingrich receives coveted endorsement of Joseph W McQuaid, publisher of New Hampshire's largest newspaper The Union Leader; McQuaid and his newspaper are known for outspoken style, and can be relied upon to aggressively support Gingrich and attack his competitors.
lead_paragraph: Newt Gingrich’s wooing of The New Hampshire Union Leader secured one of the most coveted endorsements of the presidential election.

headline.seo: The Union Leader in N.H. Backs Gingrich, Tears Down His Rivals
headline.main: In New Hampshire Newspaper, Gingrich Gets Coveted and Ferocious Supporter
headline.print_headline: In New Hampshire Newspaper, Gingrich Gets Coveted and Ferocious Supporter
